Download As…

File Name Tips

  • <DASHBOARD> will be replaced with the title of dashboard.
  • <PANEL> will be replaced with the title of this panel.
  • <TITLE> will be replaced with either the title of this panel or if it doesn't have a title it will be replaced with the title of dashboard.
  • Letter combinations that normally refer to date/time parts will be replaced with those date/time parts unless wrapped in single quotes.
